sentences.sContent: Nobody insults my family and gets away with it!
sentences.sCn: 谁也别想侮辱了我的家人之后就这么算了！

sentences.sContent: I hope Andy won’t be insulted if I don’t come.
sentences.sCn: 如果我不来，希望安迪不要介意。

phrases.pCn: 雪上加霜；伤害之外又加侮辱

words.tran: 侮辱的，无礼的；污蔑的；损害人体的

trans.tranOther: to offend someone by saying or doing something they think is rude
